containerOpenobject

precond.t[73]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A precondition to check whether a container is open. If this is defined on the action handling of an object, it only takes effect if that object behaves like a container, in which case either it, or its remapIn object, must be open for the action to proceed. **`containerOpen`**` :   `[`PreCondition`](../object/PreCondition.html)
